data.actual_result: The leader icon overlaps the name
data.expected_result: The name should be shortened in the form abc... and the icon should be present next to it, without any overlapping
data.short_description: Leader icon in group DMS overlaps the name when the owner has a long name
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a long username, preferably 20+ characters long - Make a group dm - See how the yellow crown icon overlaps your name
